description: This file defines a Kotlin object SubtitlesRepository that manages local subtitle tracks for videos in an Android application. It provides functions to retrieve subtitle tracks for specified videos and to generate subtitle configuration objects compatible with the Media3 player, using asset paths for bundled subtitles.

classes.name: SubtitlesRepository.SubtitleTrack
classes.description: Data class representing a subtitle track with properties such as id, label, assetPath, mimeType, and optional language.

methods.name: tracksForVideo
methods.description: Returns a list of SubtitleTrack objects available for a specified video ID.

methods.name: toSubtitleConfiguration
methods.description: Converts a SubtitleTrack object into a MediaItem.SubtitleConfiguration suitable for Media3 player setup.
